summary: Two childhood friends, Karim and Adil, prowl the streets of Casablanca, their native city. They do not do much, in fact they hustle rather than work. They are also unashamed dreamers, Karim... See full summary »
cast: Anas El Baz|Omar Lotfi|Mohamed Benbrahim|Ghita Tazi|Driss Roukhe|Raouia|Zakaria Atifi|Boughara Mohamed|Haitham Idrissi|Michel Botbol|Touria El Hajjaji|Hassan Essakali|Chegra Abdellatif|Abdellah Chakiri|Kenza Felali|Adel Abdellillah|Mohammed Alja|Jaouad Arfaouis|Dounya Ennassiri|Ayoub Hadir|Mostafa Hamsany|Mouad Jimssi|Tarik Rmili|Jihad Saadallah|Laure Saguez Patricia|Abdelrahman Samadi|Rachida Saoudi|Khadija Seddad|Badia Senhaji|Saïd Yessef|Abdellah Ziad
title: Casanegra
